contentrichtext.text: '''Otterbein''' is a family name and the name of several institutions and places. ==Family name== * [[Philip William Otterbein]] (1726-1813), German-American clergyman, founder of the Church of the United Brethren in Christ * [[Keith F. Otterbein]], anthropologist * [[Thomas Otterbein]], retired US Navy captain ==College== * [[Otterbein University]], Westerville, Ohio ==Place name== As a place name in the United States, at times indicating settlers that came from the [[United Brethren (disambiguation)|United Brethren]] tradition: * [[Otterbein, Indiana]] * [[Otterbein, Ohio]] * [[Otterbein, Baltimore]], Maryland, a neighborhood in South Baltimore, next to Federal Hill {{disambig}} [[Category:Surnames]]
